title: Bayesian Elastic Net Regression with Structured Prior Dependence
summary: Many regularization priors for Bayesian regression assume the regression coefficients are a priori independent. In particular this is the case for standard Bayesian treatments of the lasso and the elastic net. While independence may be reasonable in some data-analytic settings, incorporating dependence in these prior distributions provides greater modeling flexibility.
